non-inclusive: If a manager picks up this topic, he should go extra mile to solve it
inclusive: If a manager picks up this topic, they should go extra mile to solve it
non-inclusive (Spanish): Si un gerente aborda este tema, debería hacer un esfuerzo adicional para resolverlo.
inclusive (Spanish): Si la gerencia aborda este tema, debería hacer un esfuerzo adicional para resolverlo

non-inclusive: Each salesman must meet his quota by Friday
inclusive: Each salesperson must meet their quota by Friday
non-inclusive (Spanish): Cada vendedor debe cumplir con su cuota antes del viernes.
inclusive (Spanish): El personal de ventas debe cumplir con su cuota antes del viernes.

non-inclusive: We require manpower to get this done
inclusive: We require workforce to get this done
non-inclusive (Spanish): Necesitamos mano de obra para hacer esto.
inclusive (Spanish): Necesitamos mano de obra para hacer esto.

non-inclusive: If an engineer finds a flaw, he must report it
inclusive: If an engineer finds a flaw, they must report it
non-inclusive (Spanish): Si un ingeniero encuentra un defecto, debe informarlo.
inclusive (Spanish): Si el personal de ingeniería encuentra un defecto, debe informarlo.

non-inclusive: Each scientist was required to submit his proposal before the deadline.
inclusive: Each scientist was required to submit their proposal before the deadline.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Cada científico debía presentar su propuesta antes de la fecha límite.
inclusive (Spanish): Cada persona científica debía presentar su propuesta antes de la fecha límite.

non-inclusive: The chairman will address the audience at noon.
inclusive: The chairperson will address the audience at noon.
non-inclusive (Spanish): El presidente se dirigirá al público al mediodía.
inclusive (Spanish): La presidencia se dirigirá al público al mediodía.

non-inclusive: Each chairman must approve the policy.
inclusive: Each chair or chairperson must approve the policy.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Cada presidente debe aprobar la política.
inclusive (Spanish): Cada presidente o presidenta debe aprobar la política.

non-inclusive: The fireman responded quickly.
inclusive: The firefighter responded quickly.
non-inclusive (Spanish): El bombero respondió rápidamente.
inclusive (Spanish): Una persona del cuerpo de bomberos respondió rápidamente.

non-inclusive: Hey guys, let’s get started on this project.
inclusive: Hey everyone, let’s get started on this project.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Hola chicos, comencemos con este proyecto.
inclusive (Spanish): Hola equipo, comencemos con este proyecto.

non-inclusive: Our company is looking for a strong businessman to lead the project.
inclusive: Our company is looking for a strong businessperson to lead the project.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Nuestra empresa busca un empresario fuerte para liderar el proyecto.
inclusive (Spanish): Nuestra empresa busca una persona fuerte para liderar el proyecto.

non-inclusive: The firemen responded to the emergency call.
inclusive: The firefighters responded to the emergency call.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Los bomberos acudieron a la llamada de emergencia.
inclusive (Spanish): Las personas del cuerpo de bomberos acudieron a la llamada de emergencia.

non-inclusive: The chairman will make the final decision.
inclusive: The chairperson will make the final decision.
non-inclusive (Spanish): El presidente tomará la decisión final.
inclusive (Spanish): La presidencia tomará la decisión final.

non-inclusive: How many man-hours will this project take?
inclusive: How many person-hours will this project take?
non-inclusive (Spanish): ¿Cuántas horas de trabajo requiere este proyecto?
inclusive (Spanish): ¿Cuántas horas de trabajo requiere este proyecto?

non-inclusive: The mailman delivers letters every morning.
inclusive: The mail carrier delivers letters every morning.
non-inclusive (Spanish): El cartero entrega cartas todas las mañanas.
inclusive (Spanish): El personal de reparto postal entrega cartas todas las mañanas.

non-inclusive: The freshman orientation will be held next week.
inclusive: The first-year orientation will be held next week.
non-inclusive (Spanish): La orientación para los estudiantes de primer año se llevará a cabo la próxima semana.
inclusive (Spanish): La orientación para estudiantado de primer año se llevará a cabo la próxima semana.

non-inclusive: We need more manpower to finish the task.
inclusive: We need more workforce to finish the task.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Necesitamos más mano de obra para terminar la tarea.
inclusive (Spanish): Necesitamos más mano de obra para terminar la tarea.

non-inclusive: The stewardess will assist you with your luggAge.
inclusive: The flight attendant will assist you with your luggAge.
non-inclusive (Spanish): La azafata le ayudará con su equipaje.
inclusive (Spanish): La tripulación de cabina le ayudará con su equipaje.

non-inclusive: The janitor should use his keys to open the door.
inclusive: The janitor should use their keys to open the door.
non-inclusive (Spanish): El conserje debería utilizar sus llaves para abrir la puerta.
inclusive (Spanish): El personal de conserjería debería utilizar sus llaves para abrir la puerta.

non-inclusive: He committed suicide last year.
inclusive: He died by suicide last year.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Se suicidó el año pasado.
inclusive (Spanish): Se suicidó el año pasado.

non-inclusive: The man up attitude is outdated.
inclusive: The be resilient attitude is more inclusive.
non-inclusive (Spanish): La actitud de "sé hombre" está obsoleta.
inclusive (Spanish): La actitud de reprimir la vulnerabilidad está obsoleta.

non-inclusive: The prostitute was arrested.
inclusive: The sex worker was arrested.
non-inclusive (Spanish): La prostituta fue arrestada.
inclusive (Spanish): La persona que ejercía la prostitución fue arrestada.

non-inclusive: The show girls performed at the event.
inclusive: The performers took the stage at the event.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Las chicas del espectáculo actuaron en el evento.
inclusive (Spanish): El elenco del espectáculo actuó en el evento.

non-inclusive: They are not fit for leadership
inclusive: Everyone has the potential to lead
non-inclusive (Spanish): No son aptos para el liderazgo.
inclusive (Spanish): Todos tienen el potencial de liderar.

non-inclusive: She’s too bossy
inclusive: She shows leadership and confidence
non-inclusive (Spanish): Ella es demasiado mandona.
inclusive (Spanish): Ella muestra liderazgo y confianza.

non-inclusive: He’s too soft to be a leader
inclusive: Empathy is a strength in leadership
non-inclusive (Spanish): Es demasiado blando para ser un líder.
inclusive (Spanish): La empatía es una fortaleza en el liderazgo.

non-inclusive: They can’t make rational decisions
inclusive: Everyone can think critically and make informed choices
non-inclusive (Spanish): No pueden tomar decisiones racionales.
inclusive (Spanish): Todos pueden pensar críticamente y tomar decisiones informadas.

non-inclusive: He’s acting like a girl
inclusive: Everyone expresses themselves in different ways
non-inclusive (Spanish): Él está actuando como una niña.
inclusive (Spanish): Cada uno se expresa de diferentes maneras.

non-inclusive: They don’t look professional
inclusive: Professionalism comes in many forms
non-inclusive (Spanish): No parecen profesionales
inclusive (Spanish): El profesionalismo se presenta de muchas formas.

non-inclusive: You throw like a girl
inclusive: You gave it your best  that’s what counts
non-inclusive (Spanish): Lanzas como una niña
inclusive (Spanish): Lo hiciste lo mejor que pudiste, eso es lo que cuenta.

non-inclusive: Too emotional to be in politics
inclusive: Emotional intelligence is valuable in any role
non-inclusive (Spanish): Demasiado emocional para estar en política.
inclusive (Spanish): La inteligencia emocional es valiosa en cualquier rol.

non-inclusive: Only men can handle pressure
inclusive: People of all genders can thrive under pressure
non-inclusive (Spanish): Sólo los hombres pueden soportar la presión.
inclusive (Spanish): Todas las personas pueden soportar la presión.

non-inclusive: That’s not manly
inclusive: Everyone can express themselves authentically
non-inclusive (Spanish): Eso no es varonil.
inclusive (Spanish): Todos pueden expresarse auténticamente.

non-inclusive: Too old to learn this
inclusive: Learning has no Age limit
non-inclusive (Spanish): Demasiado mayor para aprender esto.
inclusive (Spanish): El aprendizaje no tiene límite de edad.

non-inclusive: That’s not ladylike
inclusive: People can behave in the way they feel comfortable
non-inclusive (Spanish): Eso no es femenino.
inclusive (Spanish): Las personas pueden comportarse de la forma en que se sientan cómodas.

non-inclusive: He’s whipped
inclusive: He values mutual respect in his relationship
non-inclusive (Spanish): Es un calzonazos.
inclusive (Spanish): Valora el respeto mutuo en su relación.

non-inclusive: Real men don’t cry
inclusive: Everyone should feel free to express their emotions
non-inclusive (Spanish): Los hombres de verdad no lloran.
inclusive (Spanish): Todos deberían sentirse libres de expresar sus emociones.

non-inclusive: They can’t handle tech
inclusive: Anyone can become tech-savvy with the right support
non-inclusive (Spanish): No pueden manejar la tecnología.
inclusive (Spanish): Cualquiera puede convertirse en un experto en tecnología con el soporte adecuado.

non-inclusive: That job is not for women
inclusive: Everyone should be free to pursue any career
non-inclusive (Spanish): Ese trabajo no es para mujeres.
inclusive (Spanish): Todo el mundo debería ser libre de elegir cualquier carrera.

non-inclusive: Men don’t do caregiving
inclusive: Anyone can be nurturing and supportive
non-inclusive (Spanish): Los hombres no se dedican al cuidado de otras personas.
inclusive (Spanish): Cualquiera puede ser cariñoso y comprensivo.

non-inclusive: She’s asking for it
inclusive: Everyone deserves safety and respect
non-inclusive (Spanish): Ella se lo está buscando.
inclusive (Spanish): Todo el mundo merece seguridad y respeto.

non-inclusive: A nurse must always be compassionate. She should listen to patients...
inclusive: A healthcare worker must always be compassionate. They should listen to patients...
non-inclusive (Spanish): Una enfermera siempre debe ser compasiva. Debe escuchar a los pacientes...
inclusive (Spanish): El personal sanitario siempre debe ser compasivo. Debe escuchar a los pacientes...

non-inclusive: A police officer must act decisively. He should be vigilant...
inclusive: A law enforcement officer must act decisively. They should be vigilant...
non-inclusive (Spanish): Un policía debe actuar con decisión. Debe estar atento...
inclusive (Spanish): El personal del cuerpo de policía debe actuar con decisión. Debe estar atento...

non-inclusive: Men are naturally better at math and science.
inclusive: Knowledge of math and science is influenced by education, opportunity, and interest—not Gender.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Los hombres son naturalmente mejores en matemáticas y ciencias.
inclusive (Spanish): El conocimiento de las matemáticas y las ciencias está influenciado por la educación, las oportunidades y los intereses, no por el género.

non-inclusive: Women are naturally more patient than men.
inclusive: Patience varies among individuals and is not determined by Gender.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Las mujeres son naturalmente más pacientes que los hombres.
inclusive (Spanish): La paciencia varía entre individuos y no está determinada por el género.

non-inclusive: Men should be discouraged from pursuing healthcare.
inclusive: People of all Genders should be encouraged to pursue healthcare careers.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Se debe disuadir a los hombres de dedicarse a la atención sanitaria.
inclusive (Spanish): Se debe alentar a las personas de todos los géneros a dedicarse a la atención sanitaria.

non-inclusive: My girlfriend is always supportive.
inclusive: My partner is always supportive.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Mi novia siempre me apoya.
inclusive (Spanish): Mi pareja siempre me apoya.

non-inclusive: A life of a showgirl is very glamorous.
inclusive: A life of a performer is very glamorous and demanding.
non-inclusive (Spanish): La vida de una corista es muy glamorosa.
inclusive (Spanish): La vida de un artista es muy glamorosa y exigente.

non-inclusive: Someone left her bag.
inclusive: Someone left their bag.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Alguien se dejó su bolso.
inclusive (Spanish): Alguien se dejó su bolso.

non-inclusive: He is a natural leader.
inclusive: They are a natural leader.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Es un líder nato.
inclusive (Spanish): Son unos líderes natos.

non-inclusive: A policeman arrested the thief last night.
inclusive: A police officer arrested the thief last night.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Un policía detuvo al ladrón anoche.
inclusive (Spanish): Una persona del cuerpo de policía detuvo al ladrón anoche.

non-inclusive: Statistically, men are more likely to be successful than women.
inclusive: Success is influenced by opportunity and support, not Gender.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Estadísticamente, los hombres tienen más probabilidades de tener éxito que las mujeres.
inclusive (Spanish): El éxito está influenciado por las oportunidades y el apoyo, no por el género.

non-inclusive: A good policeman must be brave.
inclusive: A good police officer must be compassionate and brave.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Un buen policía debe ser valiente.
inclusive (Spanish): Una buena persona del cuerpo de policía debe ser compasiva y valiente.

non-inclusive: A strong leader is assertive, while a caring person is nurturing.
inclusive: A strong leader is assertive, and a caring person is compassionate—traits not limited by Gender.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Un líder fuerte es asertivo, mientras que una persona solidaria es cariñosa.
inclusive (Spanish): Un líder fuerte es asertivo y una persona solidaria es compasiva, rasgos que no se limitan al género.

non-inclusive: Boys are more logical; girls are better at emotions.
inclusive: Abilities in logic and emotion vary by individual, not Gender.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Los chicos son más lógicos, las chicas son mejores con las emociones.
inclusive (Spanish): Las habilidades lógicas y emocionales varían según el individuo, no por el género.

non-inclusive: Most CEOs are men, most homemakers are women.
inclusive: Successful CEOs and homemakers come from all Genders.
non-inclusive (Spanish): La mayoría de los directores ejecutivos son hombres, la mayoría de las amas de casa son mujeres.
inclusive (Spanish): Las personas que ejercen la dirección ejecutiva y las personas a cargo del hogar provienen de todos los géneros.

non-inclusive: Women are always too sensitive.
inclusive: People of all Gender identities can be sensitive due to diverse life experiences.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Las mujeres siempre son demasiado sensibles.
inclusive (Spanish): Las personas de todos los géneros pueden ser sensibles debido a diversas experiencias de la vida.

non-inclusive: The prostitute’s body was found dead in an alley.
inclusive: The persons body was found in an alley, a victim deserving dignity and justice.
non-inclusive (Spanish): El cuerpo de la prostituta fue encontrado sin vida en un callejón.
inclusive (Spanish): En un callejón fue encontrado el cadáver de una persona que merece dignidad y justicia.

non-inclusive: Girls aren’t good at science.
inclusive: Girls and boys are equally capable of excelling in science.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Las chicas no son buenas en ciencias.
inclusive (Spanish): Las chicas y los chicos tienen la misma capacidad para destacar en ciencias.

non-inclusive: Boys are bad at expressing emotions.
inclusive: All individuals express emotions differently, regardless of Gender.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Los chicos son malos expresando sus emociones.
inclusive (Spanish): Todas las personas expresan sus emociones de manera diferente, independientemente de su género.

non-inclusive: He is responsible.
inclusive: They are responsible.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Él es el responsable.
inclusive (Spanish): Son responsables.

non-inclusive: She should arrive soon.
inclusive: They should arrive soon.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Ella debería llegar pronto.
inclusive (Spanish): Deberían llegar pronto.

non-inclusive: He/She needs to check in.
inclusive: They need to check in.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Él/ella necesita registrarse.
inclusive (Spanish): Necesitan registrarse.

non-inclusive: If he or she is late, notify us.
inclusive: If they are late, notify us.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Si él o ella llega tarde, avísenos.
inclusive (Spanish): Si llegan tarde, avísenos.

non-inclusive: He/She is an excellent leader.
inclusive: They are an excellent leader.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Él/Ella es un/a excelente líder.
inclusive (Spanish): Su liderazgo es excelente.

non-inclusive: Each student should bring his or her ID.
inclusive: Each student should bring their ID.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Cada estudiante deberá traer su DNI.
inclusive (Spanish): Cada estudiante deberá traer su DNI.

non-inclusive: A doctor must care for his/her patients.
inclusive: A doctor must care for their patients.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Un médico debe cuidar de sus pacientes.
inclusive (Spanish): El personal médico debe cuidar de sus pacientes.

non-inclusive: The teacher gave his or her opinion.
inclusive: The teacher gave their opinion.
non-inclusive (Spanish): El profesor dio su opinión.
inclusive (Spanish): El profesorado dio su opinión.

non-inclusive: He/She can sign here.
inclusive: They can sign here.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Él/ella puede firmar aquí.
inclusive (Spanish): Pueden firmar aquí.

non-inclusive: A nurse should always be kind; she cares for her patients.
inclusive: A nurse should always be kind; they care for their patients.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Una enfermera siempre debe ser amable; ella se preocupa de sus pacientes.
inclusive (Spanish): El personal de enfermería siempre debe ser amable; se preocupa de sus pacientes.

non-inclusive: A police officer must be brave; he defends the public.
inclusive: A police officer must be brave; they defend the public.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Un policía debe ser valiente; él defiende a la ciudadanía.
inclusive (Spanish): El cuerpo de policía debe ser valiente; defiende a la ciudadanía.

non-inclusive: A kindergarten teacher loves children; she nurtures them well.
inclusive: A kindergarten teacher loves children; they nurture children well.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Una profesora de infantil ama a los niños; los cuida bien.
inclusive (Spanish): El profesorado de educación infantil ama a los niños y a las niñas; los cuida bien.

non-inclusive: A pilot must be confident; he must make quick decisions.
inclusive: A pilot must be confident; they must make quick decisions.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Un piloto debe ser seguro; debe tomar decisiones rápidas.
inclusive (Spanish): La persona a cargo del pilotaje debe ser segura; debe tomar decisiones rápidas.

non-inclusive: A hairstylist is creative; she helps clients look their best.
inclusive: A hairstylist is creative; they help clients look their best.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Una peluquera es creativa; ayuda a los clientes a lucir su mejor aspecto.
inclusive (Spanish): El personal de peluquería es creativo; ayuda a la clientela a lucir su mejor aspecto.

non-inclusive: A truck driver needs stamina; he drives long hours.
inclusive: A truck driver needs stamina; they drive long hours.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Un camionero necesita resistencia; conduce durante muchas horas.
inclusive (Spanish): El personal de transporte necesita resistencia; conduce durante muchas horas.

non-inclusive: A therapist listens patiently; she understands emotional needs.
inclusive: A therapist listens patiently; they understand emotional needs.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Una terapeuta escucha pacientemente; ella entiende las necesidades emocionales.
inclusive (Spanish): El personal de terapia escucha pacientemente; entiende las necesidades emocionales.

non-inclusive: A firefighter must be alert; he responds to emergencies.
inclusive: A firefighter must be alert; they respond to emergencies.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Un bombero debe estar alerta; él responde a las emergencias.
inclusive (Spanish): El personal de bomberos debe estar alerta; responde a las emergencias.

non-inclusive: A secretary manAges the schedule; she handles all the calls.
inclusive: A secretary manAges the schedule; they handle all the calls.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Una secretaria se encarga de la agenda; ella atiende todas las llamadas.
inclusive (Spanish): La secretaría se encarga de la agenda; atiende todas las llamadas.

non-inclusive: An engineer solves problems; he applies scientific principles.
inclusive: An engineer solves problems; they apply scientific principles.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Un ingeniero resuelve problemas; aplica principios científicos.
inclusive (Spanish): El personal de ingeniería resuelve problemas; aplica principios científicos.

non-inclusive: Mankind has always explored space.
inclusive: Humankind has always explored space.
non-inclusive (Spanish): La humanidad siempre ha explorado el espacio.
inclusive (Spanish): La humanidad siempre ha explorado el espacio.

non-inclusive: The workmanship on this product is excellent.
inclusive: The quality of work on this product is excellent.
non-inclusive (Spanish): La mano de obra de este producto es excelente.
inclusive (Spanish): La mano de obra de este producto es excelente.

non-inclusive: Can you man the phones this evening?
inclusive: Can you attend the phones this evening?
non-inclusive (Spanish): ¿Puedes atender los teléfonos esta noche?
inclusive (Spanish): ¿Puedes atender los teléfonos esta noche?

non-inclusive: This is a man-made fiber.
inclusive: This is a synthetic fiber.

inclusive (Spanish): Esta es una fibra sintética.

non-inclusive: Welcome ladies and gentlemen, boys and girls
inclusive: Welcome everyone
non-inclusive (Spanish): Bienvenidos damas y caballeros, niños y niñas.
inclusive (Spanish): Damos la bienvenida a todo el mundo.

non-inclusive: He ate their lunch because he was hungry.
inclusive: They ate their lunch because they were hungry.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Él se comió su almuerzo porque tenía hambre.
inclusive (Spanish): Se comió su almuerzo porque tenía hambre.

non-inclusive: She ate their lunch because she was hungry.
inclusive: They ate their lunch because they were hungry.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Ella se comió su almuerzo porque tenía hambre.
inclusive (Spanish): Se comió su almuerzo porque tenía hambre.

non-inclusive: A male scientist discovered a groundbreaking theory.
inclusive: A scientist discovered a groundbreaking theory.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Un científico descubrió una teoría innovadora.
inclusive (Spanish): La comunidad científica descubrió una teoría innovadora.

non-inclusive: A female nurse helped in the emergency room.
inclusive: A nurse helped in the emergency room.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Una enfermera ayudó en la sala de emergencias.
inclusive (Spanish): El personal de enfermería ayudó en la sala de emergencias.

non-inclusive: If an applicant is not satisfied with the Court’s decision, he may lodge an appeal
inclusive: An applicant who is not satisfied with the Court’s decision may lodge an appeal.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Si el solicitante no está satisfecho con la decisión del Tribunal, puede presentar un recurso de apelación.
inclusive (Spanish): Si la aprte solicitante no está de acuerdo con la decisión del Tribunal, puede presentar un recurso de apelación.

non-inclusive: An official’s salary is dependent on his length of service.
inclusive: An official’s salary is dependent on length of service
non-inclusive (Spanish): El salario de un funcionario depende de su antigüedad en el servicio.
inclusive (Spanish): El salario del personal funcionario depende de su antigüedad en el servicio.

non-inclusive: The staff member should send the relevant documents to his supervisor.
inclusive: The relevant documents should be sent to one’s supervisor.
non-inclusive (Spanish): El miembro del personal debe enviar los documentos pertinentes a su supervisor.
inclusive (Spanish): Los documentos pertinentes deben enviarse a la persona supervisora.

non-inclusive: You throw like a girl.
inclusive: You do not throw well.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Lanzas como una niña.
inclusive (Spanish): No lanzas bien.

non-inclusive: Paul’s ladylike handshake did not impress his new boss, who believes salespeople need a firm handshake.
inclusive: Paul’s handshake did not impress his new boss, who believes salespeople need a firm handshake.
non-inclusive (Spanish): El apretón de manos femenino de Paul no impresionó a su nuevo jefe, quien cree que los vendedores necesitan un apretón de manos firme.
inclusive (Spanish): El apretón de manos débil de Paul no impresionó a su nueva jefatura, quien cree que el personal de ventas necesita un apretón de manos firme.

non-inclusive: The ship slipped her moorings.
inclusive: The ship slipped its moorings
non-inclusive (Spanish): El barco zarpó.
inclusive (Spanish): El barco zarpó.

non-inclusive: Delegates are free to make presentations in their mother tongues and translations will be provided.
inclusive: Delegates are free to make presentations in their native languAges and translations will be provided.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Los delegados pueden realizar sus presentaciones en su lengua materna y se proporcionarán traducciones.
inclusive (Spanish): Las delegaciones pueden realizar sus presentaciones en su lengua materna y se proporcionarán traducciones.

non-inclusive: Last month, France and her citizens woke up to heavy snowfall.
inclusive: Last month, France and its citizens woke up to snowfall
non-inclusive (Spanish): El mes pasado, Francia y sus ciudadanos se despertaron con fuertes nevadas.
inclusive (Spanish): El mes pasado, Francia y su ciudadanía se despertaron con fuertes nevadas.

non-inclusive: Fire is man’s greatest invention
inclusive: Fire is humanity’s greatest invention
non-inclusive (Spanish): El fuego es el mayor invento del hombre.
inclusive (Spanish): El fuego es el mayor invento de la humanidad.

non-inclusive: Under the law, all men are equal
inclusive: Under the law, all people are equal.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Ante la ley todos los hombres son iguales
inclusive (Spanish): Ante la ley, todas las personas son iguales.

non-inclusive: Manmade fabrics can actually require less manpower to produce than natural fabrics.
inclusive: Synthetic fabrics can actually require fewer human resources to produce than natural fabrics.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Los tejidos artificiales pueden requerir menos mano de obra para su producción que los tejidos naturales.
inclusive (Spanish): Los tejidos artificiales pueden requerir menos mano de obra para su producción que los tejidos naturales.

non-inclusive:
The forefathers of today’s villAgers used the same methods for catching fish as today’s 
villAgers.
inclusive: The ancestors of today’s villAgers used the same methods for catching fish as today’s villAgers.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Los antepasados de los actuales aldeanos utilizaban los mismos métodos para pescar que los aldeanos de hoy en día.
inclusive (Spanish): Las personas antecesoras de los habitantes actuales utilizaban los mismos métodos para pescar que los habitantes de hoy en día.

non-inclusive: Are you really a male?
inclusive: What pronouns do you use, if you're comfortable sharing?
non-inclusive (Spanish): ¿Eres realmente un hombre?
inclusive (Spanish): ¿Qué pronombres usas si te sientes cómodo compartiendo?

non-inclusive: Men who are not aggressive and/or assertive are unmanly and likely gay
inclusive: This stereotype is harmful and false. Masculinity and sexual orientation are not defined by personality traits.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Los hombres que no son agresivos y/o asertivos son poco varoniles y probablemente homosexuales.
inclusive (Spanish): Este estereotipo es dañino y falso. La masculinidad y la orientación sexual no están definidas por rasgos de personalidad.

non-inclusive: All of our repos still use the master branch like we always have.
inclusive: We’ve updated all our repositories to use main as the default branch name, supporting more inclusive terminology in our workflows
non-inclusive (Spanish): Todos nuestros repositorios todavía usan la rama master como siempre lo hemos hecho.
inclusive (Spanish): Hemos actualizado todos nuestros repositorios para usar main como nombre de rama predeterminado, lo que admite una terminología más inclusiva en nuestros flujos de trabajo.

non-inclusive: Man the booth during the event.
inclusive: Staff the booth during the event.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Maneja el stand durante el evento.
inclusive (Spanish): Personal del stand durante el evento.

non-inclusive: We need someone to man the booth all day.
inclusive: We need someone to staff the booth all day.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Necesitamos a alguien que atienda el stand todo el día.
inclusive (Spanish): Necesitamos a alguien que atienda el stand todo el día.

non-inclusive: Volunteers will man the booth at the entrance.
inclusive: Volunteers will be at the booth to assist guests.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Los voluntarios ocuparán el puesto de la entrada.
inclusive (Spanish): Habrá voluntarios en el stand para ayudar a los invitados.

non-inclusive: Can you man the booth tomorrow morning?
inclusive: Can you take a shift at the booth tomorrow morning?
non-inclusive (Spanish): ¿Puedes atender el stand mañana por la mañana?
inclusive (Spanish): ¿Puedes atender el stand mañana por la mañana?

non-inclusive: Employees are required to man the booth for 2 hours.
inclusive: Employees are required to cover the booth for 2 hours.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Los empleados deben ocupar el stand durante 2 horas.
inclusive (Spanish): El personal debe ocupar el stand durante 2 horas.

non-inclusive: They asked me to man the information booth.
inclusive: They asked me to oversee the information booth.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Me pidieron que me ocupara del puesto de información.
inclusive (Spanish): Me pidieron que supervisara el puesto de información.

non-inclusive: Chairman of the board will address us tomorrow.
inclusive: Chairperson of the board will address us tomorrow.
non-inclusive (Spanish): El presidente de la junta se dirigirá a nosotros mañana.
inclusive (Spanish): La presidencia de la junta se dirigirá a nosotros mañana.

non-inclusive: The best man for the job will be selected.
inclusive: The best person for the job will be selected.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Se seleccionará al mejor hombre para el trabajo.
inclusive (Spanish): Se seleccionará a la mejor persona para el puesto.

non-inclusive: We need manpower to complete this project.
inclusive: We need personnel to complete this project.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Necesitamos mano de obra para completar este proyecto.
inclusive (Spanish): Necesitamos personal para completar este proyecto.

non-inclusive: He will man the help desk on Monday.
inclusive: They will staff the help desk on Monday.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Se ocupará de la mesa de ayuda el lunes.
inclusive (Spanish): Proporcionarán personal a la mesa de ayuda el lunes.

non-inclusive: The cleaning man will arrive at noon.
inclusive: The cleaner will arrive at noon.
non-inclusive (Spanish): El encargado de la limpieza llegará al mediodía.
inclusive (Spanish): La limpiadora llegará al mediodía.

non-inclusive: Women are too emotional to be leaders.
inclusive: Leadership qualities vary by individual, not Gender.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Las mujeres son demasiado emocionales para ser líderes.
inclusive (Spanish): Las cualidades de liderazgo varían según el individuo, no el género.

non-inclusive: She’s a single mom; she must be struggling financially.
inclusive: She’s managing both parenting and work responsibilities well.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Ella es madre soltera; ella debe estar luchando financieramente.
inclusive (Spanish): Ella está manejando bien las responsabilidades laborales y de crianza.

non-inclusive: He’s from the ghetto he must be trouble.
inclusive: He has a unique background that brings valuable perspective.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Él es del gueto y debe causar problemas.
inclusive (Spanish): Tiene una experiencia única que aporta una perspectiva valiosa.

non-inclusive: She plays well for a girl.
inclusive: She plays exceptionally well.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Toca bien para ser una niña.
inclusive (Spanish): Ella juega excepcionalmente bien.

non-inclusive: He’s got no rizz (Gen Z slang for charisma)
inclusive: He seems shy or reserved
non-inclusive (Spanish): No tiene rizz (argot de la Generación Z para carisma)
inclusive (Spanish): Parece tímido o reservado.

non-inclusive: She ghosted him (Gen Z slang for ignoring)
inclusive: She stopped responding to his messAges
non-inclusive (Spanish): Ella lo engañó (argot de la Generación Z para ignorar)
inclusive (Spanish): Dejó de responder a sus mensajes.

non-inclusive: That’s so lame
inclusive: That’s not cool / That’s disappointing
non-inclusive (Spanish): Eso es tan tonto
inclusive (Spanish): Eso no está bien / Eso es decepcionante

non-inclusive: She had a total breakdown—she’s a real basket case.
inclusive: She’s feeling overwhelmed and anxious right now.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Tuvo un colapso total: es un verdadero caso perdido.
inclusive (Spanish): Se siente abrumado/a y ansioso/a en este momento.

non-inclusive: That test was a cakewalk!
inclusive: That test was surprisingly easy.
non-inclusive (Spanish): ¡Esa prueba fue pan comido!
inclusive (Spanish): Esa prueba fue sorprendentemente fácil.

non-inclusive: This project really takes the cake in terms of disaster.
inclusive: This project was the most chaotic one we’ve had.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Este proyecto realmente se lleva la palma en términos de desastre.
inclusive (Spanish): Este proyecto fue el más caótico que hemos tenido.

non-inclusive: That part of town is so ghetto.
inclusive: That neighborhood faces a lot of economic challenges.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Esa parte de la ciudad es un gueto.
inclusive (Spanish): Ese vecindario enfrenta muchos desafíos económicos.

non-inclusive: I totally got gypped on that deal.
inclusive: I was cheated out of a fair deal.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Me engañaron totalmente con ese trato.
inclusive (Spanish): Me estafaron y me privaron de un trato justo.

non-inclusive: Long time no see!
inclusive: I haven’t seen you in such a long time!
non-inclusive (Spanish): ¡Mucho tiempo sin verlo!
inclusive (Spanish): ¡Hace mucho que no te veo!

non-inclusive: Sorry, no can do.
inclusive: Sorry, I can’t do that.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Lo siento, no puedo hacerlo.
inclusive (Spanish): Lo siento, no puedo hacer eso.

non-inclusive: They threw him in the paddy wagon.
inclusive: They put him in a police car.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Lo metieron en el carromato.
inclusive (Spanish): Lo metieron en un coche de policía.

non-inclusive: The peanut gallery had a lot to say during the meeting.
inclusive: The audience made several comments during the meeting.
non-inclusive (Spanish): La galería maní tuvo mucho que decir durante la reunión.
inclusive (Spanish): El público hizo varios comentarios durante la reunión.

non-inclusive: Let’s pow wow tomorrow about the project.
inclusive: Let’s meet tomorrow to discuss the project.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Mañana hablemos sobre el proyecto.
inclusive (Spanish): Nos vemos mañana para discutir el proyecto.

non-inclusive: That’s just the rule of thumb we use here.
inclusive: That’s the general guideline we follow here.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Esa es sólo la regla general que utilizamos aquí.
inclusive (Spanish): Esa es la pauta general que seguimos aquí.

non-inclusive: He was totally sold down the river by his business partner.
inclusive: He was completely betrayed by his business partner.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Su socio comercial lo vendió por completo.
inclusive (Spanish): Fue completamente traicionado por su socio/a comercial.

non-inclusive: Me and my tribe are heading out for drinks.
inclusive: My group of friends is heading out for drinks.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Mi tribu y yo vamos a tomar unas copas.
inclusive (Spanish): Mi grupo de amigos sale a tomar unas copas.

non-inclusive: Coffee is my spirit animal.
inclusive: I really connect with coffee it keeps me going!
non-inclusive (Spanish): El café es mi espíritu animal.
inclusive (Spanish): Realmente me conecto con el café, ¡me mantiene activo!

non-inclusive: We need a physically strong candidate for this role.
inclusive: We need a candidate who meets the physical requirements of this role.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Necesitamos un candidato físicamente fuerte para este puesto.
inclusive (Spanish): Necesitamos un candidato/a que cumpla con los requisitos físicos de este puesto.

non-inclusive: The homeowner hired a handyman for the repairs.
inclusive: The homeowner hired a repair person for the repairs.
non-inclusive (Spanish): El propietario contrató a un personal de mantenimiento para las reparaciones.
inclusive (Spanish): El propietario contrató a un técnico para las reparaciones.

non-inclusive: Are you girls ready for the presentation?
inclusive: Are you all ready for the presentation?
non-inclusive (Spanish): Chicas, ¿están listas para la presentación?
inclusive (Spanish): ¿Están todos listos para la presentación?

non-inclusive: That's a very effeminate way to act.
inclusive: That's a gentle way to act.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Esa es una manera muy afeminada de actuar.
inclusive (Spanish): Esa es una manera gentil de actuar.

non-inclusive: We need some muscle to move this equipment.
inclusive: We need some strong people to move this equipment.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Necesitamos algo de músculo para mover este equipo.
inclusive (Spanish): Necesitamos gente fuerte para mover este equipo.

non-inclusive: She's too emotional to handle this negotiation.
inclusive: She might find this negotiation challenging.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Está demasiado emocional para manejar esta negociación.
inclusive (Spanish): Esta negociación podría resultarle desafiante.

non-inclusive: Let's not get hysterical about this issue.
inclusive: Let's remain calm and focused on this issue.
non-inclusive (Spanish): No nos pongamos histéricos con este tema.
inclusive (Spanish): Mantengamos la calma y centrémonos en este tema.

non-inclusive: He's so metrosexual.
inclusive: He is fashion-conscious.
non-inclusive (Spanish): He's so metrosexual.
inclusive (Spanish): Es consciente de la moda.

non-inclusive: That's a very macho attitude.
inclusive: That's a very assertive attitude.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Esa es una actitud muy machista.
inclusive (Spanish): Esa es una actitud muy asertiva.

non-inclusive: We need to find a real go-getter, not a girly-man.
inclusive: We need to find a motivated person, not someone lacking in drive.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Necesitamos encontrar un verdadero emprendedor, no un hombre femenino.
inclusive (Spanish): Necesitamos encontrar una persona motivada, no alguien falto de empuje.

non-inclusive: We need a strong man to lift these boxes in the warehouse.
inclusive: We need someone with the physical ability to lift these boxes in the warehouse.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Necesitamos un hombre fuerte para levantar estas cajas en el almacén.
inclusive (Spanish): Necesitamos a alguien con la capacidad física para levantar estas cajas en el almacén.

non-inclusive: The new secretary should be good at taking notes; she’ll handle all the admin tasks.
inclusive: The new administrative assistant should be skilled at note-taking and managing tasks.
non-inclusive (Spanish): El nuevo secretario debería ser bueno tomando notas; ella se encargará de todas las tareas administrativas.
inclusive (Spanish): El nuevo/a asistente de administracion debe tener habilidades para tomar notas y gestionar tareas.

non-inclusive: He’s too girly to lead the construction team.
inclusive: Leadership in the construction team depends on skills, not Gender expression.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Es demasiado femenino para liderar el equipo de construcción.
inclusive (Spanish): El liderazgo en el equipo de construcción depende de las habilidades, no de la expresión de género.

non-inclusive: Our company prefers hiring men for technical roles.
inclusive: Our company hires based on qualifications for technical roles.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Nuestra empresa prefiere contratar hombres para funciones técnicas.
inclusive (Spanish): Nuestra empresa contrata en función de las calificaciones para roles técnicos.

non-inclusive: The cleaning lady will tidy the office after hours.
inclusive: The cleaner will tidy the office after hours.
non-inclusive (Spanish): La señora de la limpieza limpiará la oficina fuera de horario.
inclusive (Spanish): La persona de limpieza limpiará la oficina fuera de horario.

non-inclusive: A teacher must be nurturing; she helps students grow.
inclusive: A teacher must be supportive; they help students grow.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Un maestro debe ser enriquecedor; ella ayuda a los estudiantes a crecer.
inclusive (Spanish): Un/una maestro/a debe ser solidario; ayudan a los estudiantes a crecer.

non-inclusive: The delivery man will drop off the packAge by noon.
inclusive: The delivery person will drop off the packAge by noon.
non-inclusive (Spanish): El repartidor entregará el paquete antes del mediodía.
inclusive (Spanish): La persona que hace los repartos entregará el paquete antes del mediodía.

non-inclusive: We need a strong man to lead the engineering team.
inclusive: We need a qualified leader to guide the engineering team.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Necesitamos un hombre fuerte para liderar el equipo de ingeniería.
inclusive (Spanish): Necesitamos una persona que ejerza el liderazgo y esté calificado/a para guiar al equipo de ingeniería.

non-inclusive: The receptionist should smile more; she’s the face of the office.
inclusive: The receptionist should be professional; they represent the office.
non-inclusive (Spanish): La recepcionista debería sonreír más; ella es la cara de la oficina.
inclusive (Spanish): La persona de recepción debe ser profesional; Representan la oficina.

non-inclusive: He’s too effeminate to manAge the sales department.
inclusive: His manAgement style brings unique strengths to the sales department.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Es demasiado afeminado para dirigir el departamento de ventas.
inclusive (Spanish): Su estilo de gestión aporta puntos fuertes únicos al departamento de ventas.

non-inclusive: Our IT guys are the best at troubleshooting.
inclusive: Our IT team excels at troubleshooting.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Nuestros chicos de TI son los mejores en la resolución de problemas.
inclusive (Spanish): Nuestro equipo de TI se destaca en la resolución de problemas.

non-inclusive: A manager must be decisive; he sets the team’s direction.
inclusive: A manager must be decisive; they set the team’s direction.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Un directivo debe ser decisivo; él marca la dirección del equipo.
inclusive (Spanish): Una persona de dirección debe ser decisivo; marcan la dirección del equipo.

non-inclusive: The mailman delivers our office packAges daily.
inclusive: The mail carrier delivers our office packAges daily.
non-inclusive (Spanish): El cartero entrega nuestros paquetes de oficina diariamente.
inclusive (Spanish): El cartero/a entrega nuestros paquetes de oficina diariamente.

non-inclusive: Guys, let's tackle this problem.
inclusive: Everyone, let's address this problem.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Chicos, abordemos este problema.
inclusive (Spanish): Todos, abordemos este problema.

non-inclusive: Man up and deal with it.
inclusive: Show resilience and address the situation directly.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Ánimo y acéptalo.
inclusive (Spanish): Muestre resiliencia y aborde la situación directamente.

non-inclusive: That's woman's work.
inclusive: That task can be done by anyone.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Ese es trabajo de mujeres.
inclusive (Spanish): Esa tarea la puede realizar cualquiera.

non-inclusive: The girls in accounting are efficient.
inclusive: The accounting team is efficient.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Las chicas de contabilidad son eficientes.
inclusive (Spanish): El equipo contable es eficiente.

non-inclusive: He's a real ladies' man.
inclusive: He is very popular.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Es un verdadero mujeriego.
inclusive (Spanish): Es muy popular.

non-inclusive: You run like a girl!
inclusive: You have a unique running style.
non-inclusive (Spanish): ¡Corres como una niña!
inclusive (Spanish): Tienes un estilo de carrera único.

non-inclusive: The master control room needs an upgrade.
inclusive: The main control room needs an upgrade.
non-inclusive (Spanish): La sala de control principal necesita una mejora.
inclusive (Spanish): La sala de control principal necesita una mejora.

non-inclusive: He's so effeminate.
inclusive: He has a gentle demeanor.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Es tan afeminado.
inclusive (Spanish): Tiene un comportamiento amable.

non-inclusive: Are you a real man or woman?
inclusive: How do you identify your Gender?
non-inclusive (Spanish): ¿Eres un hombre o una mujer de verdad?
inclusive (Spanish): ¿Cómo identificas tu género?

non-inclusive: The cleaning lady is here.
inclusive: The cleaner is here.
non-inclusive (Spanish): La señora de la limpieza está aquí.
inclusive (Spanish): La persona de limpieza está aquí.

non-inclusive: Fireman to the rescue!
inclusive: Firefighter to the rescue!
non-inclusive (Spanish): ¡Bombero al rescate!
inclusive (Spanish): ¡Bombero al rescate!

non-inclusive: Mailman delivered the packAge.
inclusive: Mail carrier delivered the packAge.
non-inclusive (Spanish): El cartero entregó el paquete.
inclusive (Spanish): El cartero/a entregó el paquete.

non-inclusive: The chairman will make the announcement.
inclusive: The chairperson will make the announcement.
non-inclusive (Spanish): El presidente hará el anuncio.
inclusive (Spanish): El presidente / la presidenta hará el anuncio.

non-inclusive: We need more manpower.
inclusive: We need more staff.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Necesitamos más mano de obra.
inclusive (Spanish): Necesitamos más personal.

non-inclusive: We need a strong, assertive male leader.
inclusive: We need a strong, effective leader.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Necesitamos un líder masculino fuerte y asertivo.
inclusive (Spanish): Necesitamos un/a líder/esa fuerte y eficaz.

non-inclusive: He should have 10+ years of experience managing men.
inclusive: The ideal candidate will have 10+ years of experience leading teams.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Debería tener más de 10 años de experiencia manejando hombres.
inclusive (Spanish): El candidato/a ideal tendrá más de 10 años de experiencia liderando equipos.

non-inclusive: He needs to be a team player.
inclusive: They need to be collaborative.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Necesita ser un jugador de equipo.
inclusive (Spanish): Necesitan ser colaborativos.

non-inclusive: He's one of the boys.
inclusive: He's a valued member of the team.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Es uno de los chicos.
inclusive (Spanish): Es un miembro valioso del equipo.

non-inclusive: She's just being emotional.
inclusive: She's expressing her concerns.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Ella sólo está siendo emocional.
inclusive (Spanish): Está expresando sus preocupaciones.

non-inclusive: He's a real go-getter.
inclusive: They are highly motivated.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Es un verdadero ambicioso.
inclusive (Spanish): Están muy motivados.

non-inclusive: She's a workaholic.
inclusive: She's very dedicated.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Ella es una adicta al trabajo.
inclusive (Spanish): Es una persona muy dedicada.

non-inclusive: We offer maternity leave.
inclusive: We offer parental leave.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Ofrecemos baja por maternidad.
inclusive (Spanish): Ofrecemos licencia parental.

non-inclusive: This is a man's world.
inclusive: This industry is evolving to be more inclusive.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Este es un mundo de hombres.
inclusive (Spanish): Esta industria está evolucionando para ser más inclusiva.

non-inclusive: We need someone who can man the phones.
inclusive: We need someone to cover the phones.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Necesitamos a alguien que pueda atender los teléfonos.
inclusive (Spanish): Necesitamos a alguien que cubra los teléfonos.

non-inclusive: Hey guys, check out my new photo!
inclusive: Hey everyone, check out my new photo!
non-inclusive (Spanish): ¡Hola chicos, miren mi nueva foto!
inclusive (Spanish): ¡Hola a todos, miren mi nueva foto!

non-inclusive: Man, this traffic is crazy!
inclusive: Wow, this traffic is intense! or This traffic is frustrating!
non-inclusive (Spanish): ¡Hombre, este tráfico es una locura!
inclusive (Spanish): ¡Vaya, este tráfico es intenso! o ¡Este tráfico es frustrante!

non-inclusive: Having a girls' night out!
inclusive: Having a night out with friends!
non-inclusive (Spanish): ¡Teniendo una noche de chicas!
inclusive (Spanish): ¡Salir por la noche con amigos!

non-inclusive: Let's circle back, guys.
inclusive: Let's revisit this.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Volvamos atrás, muchachos.
inclusive (Spanish): Repasemos esto.

non-inclusive: His mind wondered if a doctor was behind this mess, and whether he would come forward.
inclusive: He wondered if the doctor involved would step forward to provide clarification.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Su mente se preguntaba si había un médico detrás de este lío y si él se presentaría.
inclusive (Spanish): Se pregunta si el/la médico implicado daría un paso al frente para aclarar el asunto.

non-inclusive: The prostitute's body was found dead in an alley, discarded and uncared for.
inclusive: A woman was found deceased in an alley, and investigators are working to understand the circumstances.
non-inclusive (Spanish): El cuerpo de la prostituta fue encontrado muerto en un callejón, abandonado y sin cuidados.
inclusive (Spanish): Una persona fue encontrada muerta en un callejón y los investigadores están trabajando para comprender las circunstancias.

non-inclusive: Women don't know how to drive.
inclusive: Driving ability varies by individual and is not related to Gender.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Las mujeres no saben conducir.
inclusive (Spanish): La capacidad de conducción varía según el individuo y no está relacionada con el género.

non-inclusive: He felt threatened by the presence of the monstrous, buff man.
inclusive: He felt uneasy due to the unfamiliar presence of a large man.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Se sintió amenazado por la presencia del hombre monstruoso y musculoso.
inclusive (Spanish): Se sintió incómodo debido a la presencia desconocida de una persona grande.

non-inclusive: My mom spent all day cooking for Thanksgiving.
inclusive: My family member spent the day preparing for Thanksgiving.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Mi mamá pasó todo el día cocinando para el Día de Acción de Gracias.
inclusive (Spanish): Un familiar pasó el día preparándose para el Día de Acción de Gracias.

non-inclusive: They said that Bill really wanted a dirtbike for his birthday.
inclusive: Bill was excited about the idea of getting a dirtbike for his birthday.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Dijeron que Bill realmente quería una moto de cross para su cumpleaños.
inclusive (Spanish): Bill estaba entusiasmado con la idea de regalarle una moto de cross para su cumpleaños.

non-inclusive: Melissa spent her days watching Lifetime and imbibing glasses of white wine.
inclusive: Melissa enjoyed relaxing with movies and a glass of wine.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Melissa pasaba sus días viendo Lifetime y bebiendo copas de vino blanco.
inclusive (Spanish): Melissa disfrutó relajándose con películas y una copa de vino.

non-inclusive: Cheryl was bad at saving money and thus had a financial crisis.
inclusive: Cheryl faced financial difficulties due to challenges with saving.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Cheryl no sabía ahorrar dinero y por eso tuvo una crisis financiera.
inclusive (Spanish): Cheryl enfrentó dificultades financieras debido a dificultades para ahorrar.

non-inclusive: Jenny watched in astonishment as the world class scientist had just created talking cells.
inclusive: Jenny watched in awe as the world-class scientist demonstrated a major breakthrough.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Jenny observó asombrada cómo el científico de clase mundial acababa de crear células parlantes.
inclusive (Spanish): Jenny observó con asombro cómo el científico de talla mundial demostraba un gran avance.

non-inclusive: My sister went to the mall near Christmas time for some last minute items, and got lost as she's a dumb blonde.
inclusive: My sister went to the mall near Christmas for some last-minute shopping and had trouble finding her way.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Mi hermana fue al centro comercial cerca de la época navideña a comprar algunos artículos de última hora y se perdió porque es una rubia tonta.
inclusive (Spanish): Mi hermana fue al centro comercial cerca de Navidad para hacer algunas compras de último momento y tuvo problemas para encontrar el camino.

non-inclusive: Angie couldn't find good workout clothes in her large size.
inclusive: Angie had difficulty finding workout clothes in her size.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Angie no pudo encontrar buena ropa deportiva en su talla grande.
inclusive (Spanish): Angie tuvo dificultades para encontrar ropa deportiva de su talla.

non-inclusive: He was highly respected and well on her way to being elected CEO of the company.
inclusive: She was highly respected and on her way to becoming CEO.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Era muy respetado y estaba en camino de ser elegido director ejecutivo de la empresa.
inclusive (Spanish): Era muy respetada y estaba en camino de convertirse en directora ejecutiva.

non-inclusive: The family wasn't surprised that their overweight son would be excited for his cake.
inclusive: The family was excited to celebrate their son's birthday.
non-inclusive (Spanish): A la familia no le sorprendió que su hijo con sobrepeso estuviera emocionado por su pastel.
inclusive (Spanish): La familia estaba emocionada por celebrar el cumpleaños de su hijo.

non-inclusive: He imagined having a girlfriend who was slim and attractive.
inclusive: He imagined having a partner he connected with deeply.
non-inclusive (Spanish): Se imaginaba tener una novia delgada y atractiva.
inclusive (Spanish): Se imaginaba tener una pareja con la que conectaba profundamente.
